vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀρφαξάδ, ὁ(Heb. אַרְפַּכְשַׁד),
Arphaxad: Luk.3:36.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.22;
son of: Shem (H8035);
brother of: Asshur (H0804H), Elam (H5867C), Lud (H3865) and Aram (H0758);
father of: Cainan (G2536); also called Arphaxad at Luk.3.36;
§ Arphaxad, (Proper name), indecl, Lk. 3:36*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞法撒 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "迦勒底人的堡壘"
閃的兒子, 希伯的祖先 (路 3:35)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚法撒 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "迦勒底人的堡垒"
闪的儿子, 希伯的祖先 (路 3:35)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-bác-sát hoặc Ạc-pác-sát, con của Cai-nam. H775
